title: Im trying to open account and its not working please help
body:
i tryed to open an account today and its writed to me "ur singup has failed...
i did all good and i tryed from my friend computer and it wrote the same thing...
can someone help me?
thanks

replies.body: Is the username taken? Email taken? Try clearing your cache/cookies or changing your browser.

its still not working :P 
but thanks

its writing that the user name is okey..
and i opened new email for that so..

Indeed, if the username or email is already in use then you might run into issues.  You'll want to use another email you have access to, then switch it to the pre-existing address after signing up.  Your signup may also fail if your age is set too low to play League.  :D
